name: ERVCloudForwarding
description: ERV (Emergency Response Vehicle) cloud plugin for making websocket connection with CARMA cloud, and forward ERV BSM to CARMA cloud.

configuration.description: Server IP address for V2X hub to receive BSM
Server port for V2X hub to receive BSM
An IP address of the RSU the V2X hub is connected to.
A short description for the RSU the V2X hub is connected to.
The SNMP port for sending message or command.
OID (Object Identifier) uniquely identify managed objects in a MIB database.
The log level for this plugin
